Title: Future Tense
Plot: Everybody starts to think about their future, and how they are getting into college. Joey's concerned about Pacey not having grades good enough to get into college. Drue makes everybody think it's Jen's birthday so he can make a party. Andie takes over Jack's applications and drives him crazy with her obsession over it. Gretchen is applying for a job as bartender at Mrs. Leery's restaurant, and doesn't exactly tell what happened (or what will happen) with college.
GuestStars: Alex Wharff, Nicole Arviso, Heather Avery Clyde, Ethan Wilcox, Sean Sullivan, Casey Kelvington
